ModMetadata.Name: Inventory Window Fix
ModMetadata.Author: tom_is_unlucky
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Inventory Window Fix[/h1]
Fixes inventory window saving to properly save positions of nested container windows. Also fixes the extra space between docked windows when closing a window in the middle.
This requires BepInEx and a modloader installed. Try out [url=https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad]StationeersLaunchPad[/url]. (also compatible with StationeersMods)
ModMetadata.InGameDescription: Inventory Window Fix WARNING: This is a StationeersMods Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersMods plugin. See: https://jixxed.github.io/StationeersMods/ Fixes inventory window saving to properly save positions of nested container windows
